thoughts.text: I used the execute_python_code command to open the first link returned by the google command. I will now use the execute_shell command to scrape the website and gather more information about the Brno Reservoir Trail.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the execute_shell command will allow me to easily access more information about the Brno Reservoir Trail and plan my route accordingly. This will help me ensure that I am adequately prepared for my adventure.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the execute_shell command to scrape the website and gather more information about the Brno Reservoir Trail
- Use this information to prepare for my adventure
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am adequately prepared for the trip and not take unnecessary risks.
thoughts.speak: I used the execute_python_code command to open the first link returned by the google command. I will now use the execute_shell command to scrape the website and gather more information about the Brno Reservoir Trail.

args.command_line:
curl https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada | grep -E "

Stezka Brnenska Prehrada

|
.*?
"
